1370: Hubrecht moved to Cromme straet.A.1 after marriage.

Had a daughter with Euffemia, Aghete, at age 27.
1372: Had a daughter with Euffemia, Imma, at age 29.
1373: Lost son Haghen when Haghen was 0 years old.
Euffemia gave birth to their stillborn son Haghen in 1373.

1378: Lost his wife Euffemia while she was giving birth to Pieter in 1378.
